lst.name: sentence
lst.str: White House and congressional leaders took a wait-and-see stance, after a series of meetings with former Japanese Foreign Minister Shintaro Abe, who was here paving the way for the April 29-May 2 visit of Prime Minister Yasuhiro Nakasone.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. sentiment that Japan was fighting opening its markets and "evidence to the contrary is necessary to combat this perception, or it is likley that additional efforts will be attempted to close off the American market to Japanese goods.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The signers included Democratic leader Robert Byrd of West Virginia, Republican leader Robert Dole of Kansas and others ranging from moderate to hardline on trade issues.
